name: Transformity
long_description: Transformity is empowering beer, wine & liquor stores with amazing technology. We bring enterprise-level sophistication to liquor retailers, giving them one integrated operating system for every part of their business. Our product integrates with distributors, automates manual work, and opens new sources of revenue.
one_liner: Point-of-sale & Vertical SaaS for the $75B Liquor Industry
